modName: Maya Moonheart - Standalone Follower UNP CBBE
summary: Maya Moonheart is a Standalone Follower with personality. You will find her in The Bannered Mare in Whiterun, equipped with a few goodies.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2887/11459302005_d461e938c4_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][i]Greetings Dragonborn![/i][/center]
[center][i]My Name is Maya and I am a 22 years old Nord. Well, my mother was a Nord from Skyrim. My father was a proud imperial officer, so I was born and raised in Cyrodill. They both met in Skyrim at the time my father was there to serve the empire. I am glad that my father showed me how to fight and my mother taught me some magic tricks to defend myself. But enough about my parents... They both passed and I came here to find adventure after I heard rumors about DRAGONS in Skyrim! Can you believe that? I just arrived in Whiterun, looking for someone I can trust and follow to explore the province of my origin. You will find me in The Bannered Mare and if you don't see me there, just wait a little and I will appear surely.[/i][/center]


[center][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3759/11459411756_6c84667420_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[size=5][color=#64aaff]Maya answers your questions[/color][/size]

[color=#ffcc33]Q:[/color] Hey... ehmm can I buy you a drink?
[color=#ff99ff]A:[/color] Oh thanks, I am good! But if you are hungry or thirsty I have a tomato soup here if you like?

[color=#ffcc33]Q:[/color] What else do you have?
[color=#ff99ff]A:[/color] Not much except my gear. I found a few Septims on my way here. You can have them if you are short on coins.

[color=#ffcc33]Q:[/color] What about combat?
[color=#ff99ff]A:[/color] Thanks to my lovely parents, I have my very own Combat Style. I love dual wielding my daggers and burning our common enemies' arse with a FIREBALL! :D

[color=#ffcc33]Q:[/color] So you know spells?
[color=#ff99ff]A:[/color] Yes, a few! My mother was a mage and always worried that I set the house or myself on fire. So she also showed me how to heal myself in case of... Well, you know!


[center][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3706/11459298655_8da98eb152_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][size=6][color=#64aaff]FEATURES[/color][/size][/center]

[center][size=4][color=#ffcc33]Standalone[/color][/size][/center]
[center]No other Mods required[/center]

[center][size=4][color=#ffcc33] No Lollygaggin'[/color][/size][/center]
[center]Install as usual via NMM and choose Body Option[/center]

[center][size=4][color=#ffcc33]As you wish my Thane[/color][/size][/center]
[center]Essential and marriageable[/center]

[center][size=4][color=#ffcc33]Level Up![/color][/size][/center]
[center]Levels with Player between 5 and 150[/center]

[center][size=4][color=#ffcc33]Compatible[/color][/size][/center]
[center]with Follower Tweaks, Overhauls, CBBE and UNP Body[/center]

[center][size=4][color=#ffcc33]Realistic and lore-friendly equipped[/color][/size][/center]
[center]Comes with Gold, Portions, tasty Tomato Soup and Daggers![/center]

[center][size=4][color=#ffcc33]Smart[/color][/size][/center]
[center]Has perks, spells and personality[/center]

[center][size=4][color=#ffcc33]Battleblonde[/color][/size][/center]
[center]Fights with custom Combat Style[/center]


[center][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3695/11459410606_fbcedbe5ab_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[size=5][color=#64aaff]SPELLS[/color][/size] - all on left hand

[list]
[*]Fast Healing - herself
[*]Fireball - in the enemies face!
[*]Oakflesh - instead of second wind
[/list]

[size=5][color=#64aaff]PERKS[/color][/size] - because Spells are not enough

[list]
[*]Armsmen - For more damage with her daggers
[*]Bladesman - Just give her a sword, will ya?
[*]Deep Wounds - For bleeding enemies
[*]Destruction Apprentice - For better Barbecue
[*]Dual Flurry - More splash with swords and daggers
[*]Fighting Stance - More POWER, less phew
[*]Light Foot - No tap on trap!
[*]Magic Resistance - Immunity to cheap tricks
[*]Overdraw - "Meet my bow, bitches!"
[*]Stealth - Backstabbing unleashed
[/list]


[center][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3681/11459470823_b493befed4_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][size=5][color=#64aaff]FUTURE PLANS[/color][/size][/center]
[center](Because this is kind of an Alpha Release)[/center]

[center]Custom Voice - Custom Quests - Unique Character Items[/center]
[center]The Book of Moonheart (in depth and in-game Backstory)[/center]
[center]A custom voiced Male Version[/center]

[center][img]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2874/11459342724_422e32aa21_o.jpg[/img][/center]

[size=5][color=#64aaff] MODS USED FOR THIS CREATION[/color][/size] - aka Credits and Permissions

Hair by NewSea, converted by HelloSanta (known as SG Hair Pack)
